stepTitle: The area shaded corresponds to a probability. The probability that $$x$$ is between zero and two is $$0.1$$, which can be written mathematically as P(0 < $$x$$ < 2) $$=$$ P(x < 2) $$=$$ $$0.1$$. Suppose we want to find the area between $$f(x)=20$$ and the x-axis where $$4<X<15$$. What is the area?
